name: Casual
definition: The casual style refers to comfortable and informal clothing suitable for everyday use, typically including t-shirts, jeans, and comfortable shoes.
occasion: Everyday wear, casual outings, and relaxed gatherings.

name: Formal
definition: The formal style includes clothing designed for special and formal occasions, such as suits, formal shirts, and classic shoes.
bodyShape: Suitable for various body shapes (rectangular, apple, inverted triangle)
bodyType: Suitable for medium and slim body types
occasion: Weddings, business meetings, formal events, and galas.

name: Chic
definition: The chic style refers to clothing that creates an attractive and classy appearance with modern and beautiful designs, typically used at parties and social events.
bodyType: Suitable for medium and slim body types
occasion: Cocktail parties, social events, and upscale gatherings.

name: Bohemian
definition: The bohemian style refers to free and informal clothing with diverse patterns and colors, often inspired by various cultures, conveying a sense of freedom and creativity.
occasion: Music festivals, art events, and casual gatherings.

name: Punk
definition: The punk style refers to clothing with bold and edgy designs, typically including leather, studs, and unusual patterns, recognized as a symbol of rebellion and nonconformity.
bodyShape: More suitable for slim and average body shapes (rectangular and inverted triangle)
occasion: Concerts, alternative events, and casual outings.

name: Gothic
definition: The gothic style refers to clothing with dark colors, unusual designs, and specific details that typically convey a mysterious and dark atmosphere.
occasion: Gothic events, themed parties, and alternative gatherings.

name: Sporty
definition: The sporty style includes clothing designed for sports and daily activities, typically including sports t-shirts, shorts, and athletic shoes.
bodyShape: Suitable for various body shapes (rectangular and inverted triangle)
occasion: Sports events, casual outings, and workouts.

name: Luxury
definition: The luxury style refers to high-quality clothing with unique designs and luxury brands, used for special events and formal parties.
bodyType: Suitable for medium and slim body types
occasion: High-end events, galas, and formal dinners.

name: Streetwear
definition: The streetwear style refers to clothing with youthful and informal designs, typically inspired by urban and street culture.
occasion: Casual outings, urban events, and social gatherings.

name: Artistic
definition: The artistic style refers to clothing with creative and artistic designs, typically using specific colors and patterns that convey a sense of creativity.
occasion: Art exhibitions, creative events, and casual gatherings.

name: Minimalist
definition: The minimalist style refers to clothing with simple designs and minimal details that emphasize simplicity and functionality.
bodyType: Suitable for medium and slim body types
occasion: Casual outings, work environments, and minimalist events.

name: Classic
definition: The classic style includes clothing with timeless and traditional designs, typically including suits and formal shirts.
bodyShape: Suitable for various body shapes (rectangular and apple)
bodyType: Suitable for medium and slim body types
occasion: Formal events, business meetings, and upscale gatherings.

name: Retro
definition: The retro style refers to clothing inspired by past decades, typically including vintage patterns and designs.
occasion: Themed parties, retro events, and casual outings.

name: Eco
definition: The eco style refers to clothing made from natural and sustainable materials that help preserve the environment, typically featuring simple and comfortable designs.
occasion: Eco-friendly events, casual outings, and nature gatherings.

name: Futuristic
definition: The futuristic style refers to clothing with innovative and modern designs, typically featuring unique details and new technologies.
bodyShape: More suitable for slim and average body shapes (rectangular and inverted triangle)
occasion: Fashion shows, tech events, and futuristic-themed gatherings.

name: Teenage
definition: The teenage style refers to clothing designed for teenagers, typically including t-shirts, jeans, and comfortable wear.

name: Experiential
definition: The experiential style refers to clothing that helps create unique and special experiences, typically featuring creative and diverse designs.
occasion: Special events, experiential gatherings, and creative workshops.

name: New Classic
definition: The new classic style refers to clothing with modern and stylish designs that pay new respect to classics.

name: Avant-garde
definition: The avant-garde style refers to clothing with unconventional and innovative designs that often push the boundaries of fashion.

name: Traditional
definition: The traditional style refers to clothing with cultural and historical designs, typically used in special and cultural ceremonies.

name: Minimal
definition: The minimal style refers to clothing with simple and efficient designs that emphasize simplicity and beauty.

occasion: Casual outings, minimalist events, and work environments.

name: Fantasy
definition: The fantasy style refers to clothing with imaginative and unusual designs, typically used in special events and concerts.

name: Surrealism
definition: The surrealism style refers to clothing with unusual and dreamlike designs, typically featuring specific patterns and colors.

name: Casual Elegance
definition: The casual elegance style refers to clothing that is comfortable yet classy, typically used for informal gatherings.

name: Rustic Chic
definition: The rustic chic style refers to clothing with natural and comfortable designs that typically convey a rural and cozy feeling.

name: Luxury Streetwear

definition: The postmodern fashion style refers to clothing with unconventional designs and various combinations that typically challenge fashion standards.

name: Workwear
definition: The workwear style refers to clothing with practical and durable designs, typically used for work and daily activities.

name: Smart Casual
definition: The smart casual style refers to clothing that combines comfort and formality, typically suitable for informal meetings and work environments.
